title: Where can I get Teleneue font by Hubert Jocham? (seen in Surface and Details magazine)
content: I know that Hubert Jocham's site is at [http://www.hubertjocham.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017231141/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/ "http://www.hubertjocham.de") I also Know that I am not the first person to ask for this on this forum. What I do not Know, however, is if I can obtain the font.
author: Alfonso

comments.content: Why don't you contact him through his website? Hubert licenses his fonts directly.
Thank you for the information Bald Condensed: It did not occur to me that he might licenses his fonts directly.

BTW no need to post everywhere

[http://typophile.com/node/16983](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017231141/http:/typophile.com/node/16983 "http://typophile.com/node/16983")

[http://typophile.com/node/16985](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017231141/http:/typophile.com/node/16985 "http://typophile.com/node/16985")
Yup, last one who did that got his @ss booted. By Dav and me if I recall correctly. O:^)

Yea, Be thankful that I wasnt even around this time.. :)

_( Nah, I am not thaaat happy about being one of the angry repliers, here on Typophile, what about you Yves.? :)_

Dav
Hey, it _is_ my job to keep this place clean. Good thing these instances are few and far between. ;^)
